RACE

Our association of computer science department is dedicated to fostering collaboration, innovation, and excellence within the field, empowering members to advance research, education, and industry practices.

STUDENTS

The students of the Association are driven by a passion for innovation, constantly pushing boundaries and embracing challenges to enhance their skills and contribute meaningfully to the ever-evolving tech landscape.

UI/UX

The association's faculty members provide invaluable expertise and mentorship, fostering an environment for academic growth and collaboration in computer science and engineering.

Visual Design

The association excels in hosting events and activities with precision, creating a dynamic environment for learning and networking in the field of computer science and engineering.
